name: Imseɣti n tira n teqbaylit
short_description: Asenfar n yemseɣti n tira n tmaziɣt-taqbaylit  d ahil i yessefqaden tira n tmaziɣt akken ad ttwasseɣtunt (ad ttwaṣeḥḥeḥent) ma llant-d deg-sent tuccḍiwin. Taswiɛt-a, ad tzemrem ad tesqedcem ahil-a deg Firefox akked wahil n tira n LibreOffice ( http://www.libreoffice.org ) / OpenOffice ( https://www.openoffice.org/ )
